mapper.select: SELECT m.market_no , m.market_category , m.market_title , m.market_date , d.market_count , (SELECT COUNT(market_no) FROM TB_MARKET) m_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_BOARD b , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) like_count, like_no FROM TB_LIKE WHERE like_type = 0 GROUP BY like_no) l WHERE b.board_no = l.like_no(+) AND (l.like_count >= 5 OR b.board_hit >= 30)) bHot_count , (SELECT COUNT(board_no) FROM TB_BOARD) bNew_count FROM TB_MARKET m , (SELECT market_no, SUM(market_count) market_count FROM TB_ORDER_DETAIL GROUP BY market_no) d WHERE m.market_no = d.market_no(+) AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY d.market_count DESC

SELECT m.market_no , m.market_category , m.market_title , m.market_date , d.market_count FROM TB_MARKET m , (SELECT market_no, SUM(market_count) market_count FROM TB_ORDER_DETAIL GROUP BY market_no) d WHERE m.market_no = d.market_no(+) AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY m.market_date DESC

SELECT b.board_no , b.board_title , b.board_hit , b.board_date , l.like_count , c.comment_count FROM TB_BOARD b , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) like_count, like_no FROM TB_LIKE WHERE like_type = 0 GROUP BY like_no) l , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) comment_count, board_no FROM TB_B_COMMENT GROUP BY board_no) c WHERE b.board_no = l.like_no(+) AND b.board_no = c.board_no(+) AND (l.like_count >= 5 OR b.board_hit >= 30) AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY l.like_count DESC, b.board_hit DESC
